statements: DELETE FROM IoT_Sensor_Data WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND network_traffic > 5000;
DELETE FROM IoT_Sensor_Data WHERE data_timestamp < '2022-09-01' AND sensor_name LIKE 'Temperature%';
DELETE FROM sensor_metadata WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature' AND last_calibration < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM NetworkTrafficSensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Main Street');
DELETE FROM sensor_readings WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensor_metadata WHERE status = TRUE;
